      • createCRFPPData

        public int createCRFPPData(File corpusDir,
                  File trainingOutputPath,
                  File evalOutputPath,
                  double splitRatio)
        Add the selected features for the segmentation model
        Parameters:
        corpusDir - path where corpus files are located
        trainingOutputPath - path where to store the temporary training data
        evalOutputPath - path where to store the temporary evaluation data
        splitRatio - ratio to consider for separating training and evaluation data, e.g. 0.8 for 80%
        Returns:
        the total number of used corpus items

      • addFeaturesSegmentation

        public int addFeaturesSegmentation(String sourceTEIPathLabel,
                          String sourceRawPathLabel,
                          File trainingOutputPath,
                          File evalOutputPath,
                          double splitRatio)
        Add the selected features for the segmentation model
        Parameters:
        sourceTEIPathLabel - path to corpus TEI files
        sourceRawPathLabel - path to corpus raw files
        trainingOutputPath - path where to store the temporary training data
        evalOutputPath - path where to store the temporary evaluation data
        splitRatio - ratio to consider for separating training and evaluation data, e.g. 0.8 for 80%
        Returns:
        number of examples
